ConnectId.description: Units: Unique identifier. Unique number that identifies a particular telemetry device's connection to the telemetry server.

ConnectStatus.title: Connect Status
ConnectStatus.description: Specifies the telemetry device's current connection status to the telemetry server as an integer value.

oneOf.title: Connected
oneOf.description: The telemetry device connected to the telemetry server.

oneOf.title: Disconnected
oneOf.description: The telemetry device intentionally disconnected from the telemetry server.

oneOf.title: Dropout
oneOf.description: The telemetry device unintentionally dropped its connection from the telemetry server.
